attributes.action: Bring back children's A&E and maternity facilities to Southport hospital.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At this moment in time, all children's A&E services are provided by Ormskirk hospital, 9 miles from Southport. We believe that this is unacceptable and wastes valuable time that could be spent saving the lives of children.
